title: pbe account error 500 something gone wrong
body: anyone can help me ? pbe account error 500 something gone wrong what is this ?{{champion:92}}

replies.body: I've seen a few reports on this, and it seems to be a connection problem.  You may be able to resolve this by accessing the page on another device completely,  another browser, or clearing your [cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).  Let me know if the issue persits.
